title: India must spend in green hydrogen R&D, infrastructure: Ganapati Myneni
description: To realize its Viksit Bharat 2047 vision, India must enhance R&D, invest in hydrogen production infrastructure, and advance thorium-based molten salt reactors, says Professor Ganapati Myneni. He emphasizes scaling up green hydrogen technologies, improving cost-efficiency, and fostering public-private partnerships to achieve energy independence and global leadership in sustainable energy.
